DistilledODN is a bootstrapped SaaS startup unit inside a larger Digital Marketing agency. We are 5 core team members, looking to hire two more roles immediately. We literally created the market we operate in and are building an exciting platform. We are passionate about being the best place for the best people to work, and value an open and welcoming culture.

Front-End developer | London, UK | Onsite/Remote This role is primarily working on our app (think CMS), but also our marketing site. You will have a lot of leeway to rebuild things should you wish. You will be able to work remotely most of the time, but will need to be at our office in London about 4 days a month (when we try to all be together). More info: https://jobs.lever.co/distilled/bbcd231a-bd7b-45fc-a717-2939...

SRE / Devops | London, UK | Onsite/Remote Infrastructure is critical to our platform, with a tight coupling between our app and the infrastructure, which makes for a lot of fun challenges to work through! You will be able to work remotely most of the time, but will need to be at our office in London about 4 days a month (when we try to all be together). More info: https://jobs.lever.co/distilled/c0786e6a-f85d-4121-b5d9-4a9c...

More about the platform here: https://odn.distilled.net/
